CloudinaryConfig
Configuration class for initializing Cloudinary MediaManager.
DatabaseReferences
File: DatabaseReferences.java Role:
- Provides centralized access to all Firestore collections used in the application.
- Ensures consistent reference names and reduces duplication across activities.

Issues:
- Assumes the device is online; Firestore references are not checked for connectivity.

A utility class that performs the random draw of entrants for an event.

Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FinalEntrantsDialogFragment
 
GuidelinesActivity
Activity that displays app guidelines to entrant users.
LoadAppActivity
File: LoadAppActivity.java Role:
- Loads the device_id for the current device and checks if a profile is linked to it.
- Displays the app logo for a few seconds as a loading/intro screen.
- If a profile exists, starts the appropriate home screen activity based on the user's role.
- If no profile is found, starts the SignUpActivity to allow the user to create an account.

Issues:
- Assumes the device is online; no handling for Firebase access failures when offline.
LoadAppActivityTest
 
MainActivity
 
NavBarHelper
Helper class to set up the navigation bar in the admin interface.
NotificationAdapter
File: NotificationAdapter.java Role:
- Adapter for displaying a list of notifications
- Handles putting notification data to UI elements such as title, message, timestamp, read/unread status.
- Allows marking notifications as read.
- Handles buttons to navigate the user to the related event.

Issues:
- Assumes Firestore operations always succeeds; no offline handling.
NotificationAdapterTest
 
NotificationHelperClass
File: NotificationHelperClass.java Role:
- Provides helper methods for creating and sending notifications.
- Sends notifications to waiting list entrants, invited entrants, and individual entrants when their invitation is cancelled by the organizer.
NotificationModel
File: NotificationModel.java Role:
- Represents a notification sent to a user.
NotificationModelTest
 
NotificationsActivity
File: NotificationsActivity.java Role:
- Displays a list of notifications received by the currently logged-in entrant.

Issues:
- Assumes the device is online and fetches firestore data.
OrganizerHomeActivity
 
Profile
File: Profile.java
ProfileTest
 
ProfileViewActivity
File: ProfileViewActivity.java Role:
- Lets the user view their current information such as name, email, and phone number.
- Collects updated profile information that the user wants to change.
- Updates this information in the Profile collection in Firestore.
- Updates the same set of data in the Entrant, Organizer, or Admin collection, depending on the user's role.
- Lets the user delete their account/profile from the app.

Issues:
- Assumes the device is online.
SampleEntrantsActivity
Activity that allows organizers to trigger a draw that selects entrants from an event's waiting list.
SignUpActivity
File: SignUpActivity.java Role:
- Collects user information such as device id, name, email, phone number, and preferred role.
- Stores this data in the Profile collection in Firestore.
- Depending on the selected role, also stores the same data in the Entrant, Organizer, or Admin collection.
- Entrants also receive an allowNotification boolean field.
- After successful sign up, navigates the user to the appropriate home screen based on role.

Issues:
- Assumes the device is online.
SignUpActivityUITest
 
UsersAdapter
RecyclerView Adapter used to display a list of users (entrants) for an event.
UsersAdapterTest
 
WaitingEntrantsDialogFragment
A DialogFragment that displays a waiting list of entrants for a given event.
WaitingListHelper
 
WaitingListHelper.WaitingListCallback
 
WaitingListHelper.WaitingListDataCallback
 
YourEventsActivity
File: YourEventsActivity.java Role: - Display the list of events the current user has joined or is on the waiting list for.
YourPastEventsActivity
File: YourEventsActivity.java Role: - Display the list of events the current user is in the waiting, invited, or confirmed list.
